attributes.action: Make it mandatory for establishments to serve people Halal and non-Halal food
attributes.additional_details:
Typically, I would not like isolate Halal meat but I have never come across restaurants serving Kosher meat to such a great extent.
I think that there should be a balance and people should have the option to choose according to their dietary requirements and religious beliefs. Especially, in restaurant chains where the customer doesn’t have an option.
attributes.background:
In recent years in the UK, many food establishments have been serving us Halal food as the only option. 
However, you live in a big city, you will be able to appreciate how hard it is to come across restaurants, takeaways, etc. where non-Halal food is not an option.
